name: Extra Settings for RocketChat
author: Andrew A. Barber

sections.description:
Extra settings for Rocket.Chat’s WordPress plugin. Helps display better on sites that have WooCommerce activated, adjust if data is collected from signed in users and more.

Author

Andrew A. Barber | Buy me a ☕ | GitHub | Twitter
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/rocketchat-extra-settings directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Nothing is showing?

Please ensure you have removed the outdated version of the RocketChat LiveChat plugin.

I would like it to do {this feature}

Great! Start a support ticket with {this feature} and I can consider it!

Is it free?

Sure is, though I would love if you could buy me a coffee!

Sprechen Sie Deutsch?

Ja, die Übersetzungen kommen.
